transcript:
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji Pravesh ji baat kar sakte hain abhi?
Executive: Ek aur time chahiye tha batao aapko bol raha hu main aapko payment ke liye wahi baat kar raha hu bas hai na abhi na Shweta mam abhi hai nahi. To kuch payment ka arrange karke aapko karane ki meri Shweta se bhi baat hui thi wo actually Ghaziabad mein hai kisi function mein.
Customer: Wo to aaj college gayi hai unka exam tha aaj meri baat hui thi unse.
Executive: To jhoot bol diya fir aapko mujhe lag raha hai.
Customer: Haan unhone mujhse bola ki aaj mera college hai matlab ki shayad college mein exam tha.
Executive: Ji mein kal Ghaziabad shadi mein gayi hue the matlab parso gaye the log kal waha function tha aur aaj subah morning unko return aana tha lekin morning mein aate hue wo sham tak ghar pahuchenge.
Customer: Theek hai bas aap mujhe ye confirm kar do sir honey jar ki category main remove kar doon nahi aayegi kal se lead jo aapka ek issue hai na wo nahi aayega sir.
Customer: Aap mujhe abhi bata do kyuki main do hafte se bol raha hu aap mujhe abhi bol do honey jar ki category hatane ke liye main abhi hata deta hu nahi aapke pass koi bhi lead plastic ki jayegi bas ek wahi category hai jiske wajah se plastic ki lead aapko dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Actual mein main aapko batau na ek to Shweta do din se nahi aa rahi hai to main na thoda sa busy hu mafi chahta hu mere ko nahi bolna chahiye sab mujhe achcha nahi lag raha bolte hue kyuki aapka already payment release ho gaya lekin main na ye jo purane materials wagera the wo dispatch karane mein laga hua hu. Kyuki chhote bhai ko dekhna aata nahi hai to sab cheeze mere ko hi dekhna pad raha hai is wajah se hai na to please main aapko request karunga thoda sa time dijiye main aapko karta hu abhi hai na.
Customer: Par sir ye payment ka sir aaj hi isko karwaiyega sir.
Executive: Main poori koshish karta hu 99% aaj poori karta hu aapko.
Customer: Sir teen din se aap yahi bol rahe ho ki 100% aaj ho jayega 100% sir bas aapke hi words mein na sir hum aage baat kar rahe hain bas aapke words mein aur aapke hi words mein hume sunne ko mil raha hai ki aap client hai.
Executive: Main aapko bol raha hu main waqt nahi kharab hone dunga aapki theek hai.
Customer: Kara.
Customer: Theek hai sir main wait kar raha hu 6 baje tak sir.
Executive: Ji ji sure sure definitely theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants honey jar category removed.

- Delay in payment release.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve payment issue today.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, category removal
